Sentencas: Doped ceria materials are ionic conductors currently under investigation for use in solid oxide fuel cells, catalysts, and other applications.
Titulo: Heat capacities and thermodynamic functions of neodymia and samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: We measured the heat capacity of several doped ceria samples from 1.8 K to 300 K to better understand their physical properties.
Titulo: Heat capacities and thermodynamic functions of neodymia and samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: The samples used in this study were either singly doped with Nd or Sm, or co-doped with both Nd and Sm.
Titulo: Heat capacities and thermodynamic functions of neodymia and samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: This work complements an earlier detailed study of their heats of formation and ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Heat capacities and thermodynamic functions of neodymia and samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: Here we provide the thermodynamic functions based on theoretical fits of our heat capacity measurements including C-p,C-m degrees, Delta S-T(0)m degrees, Delta H-T(0)m degrees, and Phi(m degrees).
Titulo: Heat capacities and thermodynamic functions of neodymia and samaria doped ceria

Sentencas: We also detected splitting of nuclear magnetic states, which appeared as an upturn in the heat capacity below 10 K. We observed this phenomenon in all samples and provide calculations of the local magnetic field causing the splitting.
Titulo: Heat capacities and thermodynamic functions of neodymia and samaria doped ceria
